snippet: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., on the “Late Show” Thursday, said, “I’d be lying if I said that I knew I was there.”
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr makes appearance on Stephen Colbert's Late Show, with host Colbert seemingly encouraging him to consider a Democratic presidential run for 2016; Biden openly discusses his ongoing grief over the recent loss of his son Beau, saying it is a strong factor in any decision to be made about running for office.
lead_paragraph: Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., on the “Late Show” Thursday, said, “I’d be lying if I said that I knew I was there.”

headline.main: Joe Biden, in Colbert Interview, Expresses Doubts About Bid for President
headline.print_headline: Biden Shares With Colbert His Painful Inner Debate

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
